Mastitis Feel gently painful part of 
breast 
Check temperature 
Observe a breastfeed if not yet 
done 
• Encourage breastfeeding 
• Teach correct positioning 
and attachment 
• If no improvement in 2 
days, refer to hospital 
• Let her breastfeed on 
healthy breast. 
• Express milk from affected 
breast and discard until 
no fever 
• If severe pain, give 
paracetamol 
Refer to the newborn guidelines for care of the well term newborn
